title: The Apocalypse’s Great Merchant - Novel Updates
tags: Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Magical Space   Outer Space   Revenge   Second Chance   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Time   年华
description: After her previous life, Lan Ke luckily received an universal trade system, and also a ruthless food waster. After initializing the universal trade, becoming a universe merchant, it was the good days of breezing disasters, face-hitting, embracing handsome men! Though as she got stronger and stronger, she stumbled upon the scary secret of the apocalypse!>
